items.title: Real-time Task Updates
items.description: Enable team members to see task changes instantly across all devices.
acceptance_criteria: When a user updates a task, all other team members see the change within 2 seconds.
Task status, assignee, and due date changes are reflected without requiring a page refresh.
non_functional: System latency for updates must be under 2 seconds.
Support at least 100 concurrent users without performance degradation.

items.title: Team Chat Integration
items.description: Provide an in-app chat feature for team members to communicate about tasks.
acceptance_criteria: Users can send and receive messages in real-time within a project workspace.
Chat history is stored and retrievable for at least 90 days.
non_functional: Messages must be delivered within 1 second in 95% of cases.
Chat data must be encrypted in transit and at rest.

notes: The requirement is high-level and does not specify platforms (web, mobile) or integration needs. Assumed core features include real-time updates and communication for collaboration.
